title: Oily and musty
description: Truly smells like it came of the back of an ox cart.
comment_text: I though it made me smell masculine.

title: LineUp
comment_text: Too weak for my bristly beard hairs

title: Just for Men
description: Supposed to give me a salt and pepper look, but really makes me look old.
comment_text: Here comes Santa Clause is more like it
